text:
It's getting dark and cold outside. 

Wind sweeps accross your shoulders as you get closer and closer to your destination.
You start to hear [color=#6abe30][i]the music[/i][/color] playing and bass beating. Your fingers start tapping and your head nodding as you walk closer.

You arrive to a local dance club called [color=#76428a][b]'The Limited'[/b][/color]. 

This place has been here for years. People come here often and the place is fabulous.

Good evening sir. 
We are full. 
There's no more space. 
Nada. 
We only have [color=#ac3232][u]limited space[/u][/color] available.

There must be a way to get inside. 
No. matter. what. it. takes. 

You know, [color=#d77bba][i]tonights the night![/i][/color]

I've come a long way to here. 

Is there any way I could get inside?

Now that I think of it. 
I've been getting [i]really hungry[/i] and my shift is not gonna end very soon. 
Could you get me a [color=#8f563b]hotdog[/color] from that vendor over there?

You look to your right where the doorman is pointing. 
There's a small wagon with huge yellow sign that says [color=#fbf236]'Hotdog to fill ya'[/color].
